channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boot Tesla and Apple from your ‘magnificent seven,’ tech-fund manager suggests
Bessent: Tariffs will 'boomerang' back to April levels by Aug. 1 for countries without deals
item.description: President Donald Trump in April announced a 90-day pause on the tariffs he had unveiled just days prior on virtually every major trading partner.

item.title: UnitedHealth, Sherwin-Williams, Travelers pace decline as Dow loses 200 points
Tesla shares decline sharply at open as Musk touts new political party
Rep. Mark Green resigns from Congress, leaving Speaker Johnson with an even narrower Republican majority in the House
item.description: Rep. Mark Green said he was returning to the private sector to start his own business, without sharing details about the business.

item.title: Trump says Musk has gone 'off the rails' after Tesla CEO announces new political party
item.description: Elon Musk said in a post on X Saturday that he had set up the "American Party" to compete against the Republican and Democratic parties.

item.title: Economic calendar: Small-business mood gauge leads off post–July 4 data
Tesla shares under pressure after Musk announces plans for new political party
Elon Musk says he has formed a new U.S. political party, the 'America Party'
item.description: Elon Musk, the world's richest man, suggests the new party would focus "on just 2 or 3 Senate seats and 8 to 10 House districts."

item.title: Trump's tariffs deadline is looming for Europe. Here's where things stand
item.description: The U.S. and the European Union have not yet struck a trade deal with just days to go before Trump's tariff reprieve is set to end.
